ItinerarySegment.Title: Arrive in Athens, Greece
ItinerarySegment.Text: Take an included transfer to your hotel. The rest of the day is free to explore this lively capital or relax in a sidewalk cafe.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Athens Sightseeing & Free Time
ItinerarySegment.Text: Morning sightseeing includes views of the Agora, where Socrates taught, plus, see the Royal Palace, Temple of Zeus and Hadrian’s Arch. Then a walking tour shows you the Acropolis and Parthenon. After views of the stadium built for the first modern Olympic Games in 1896, the rest of the day is free.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Athens / Piraeus / Mykonos
ItinerarySegment.Text: At Piraeus, board your ship and cruise to stylish Mykonos.There’s time at leisure to explore the town and beaches before returning to the ship.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Kusadasi / Patmos
ItinerarySegment.Text: Arrive in Kusadasi early this morning. Maybe take an optional excursion to Ephesus. Continue cruising to Patmos with time for an excursion or to relax.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Rhodes
ItinerarySegment.Text: Rhodes is your next stop. There is time to explore the old town and visit the ancient city of Lindos.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Cruising: Heraklion / Santorini
ItinerarySegment.Text: Sail to Heraklion on the island of Crete. Then on to the beautiful volcanic island, Santorini. Perhaps take an excursion to Fira.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Disembark Piraeus / Athens
ItinerarySegment.Text: Early morning arrival at Piraeus. Transfer to your Athens hotel. Then there is time to relax, explore or do some shopping.

ItinerarySegment.Title: Depart Athens
ItinerarySegment.Text: You will be transferred to the airport where your vacation ends.
